channel.title: Fitna the Movie
channel.description:
Yup, Fitna the Movie came out.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bCrCsTMokTU
The video might not even work because of the millions of people watching it. For the people who don't know it yet, it's made by Geert Wilders, some idiot in the politic here in holland. He hates the Islam, Koran etc. because of terrorists and such, but he's exaggerating it. Now he made some movie against the Islam and Koran, yet he doesn't care he'll be the next one killed here in holland. There used to be some person Theo van Gogh, who has been killed already, and Geert Wilders is the next one probably. He says he can take criticism, but after soo many bad votes on his movie he has even disabled the voting and commenting loll.
[b]Geert Wilders:[/b] [img]http://www.volkskrantblog.nl/pub/mm/2007/12/1196718810.34681.jpg[/img]
[b]Theo van Gogh:[/b] (When they killed him) [img]http://www.thefileroom.org/images/theo-van-gogh_web.jpg[/img]
gg wilders, imo, die painfully.

item.title: Fitna the Movie
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

LiveLeak has removed the video.

Following threats to our staff of a very serious nature, and some ill informed reports from certain corners of the British media that could directly lead to the harm of some of our staff, Liveleak.com has been left with no other choice but to remove Fitna from our servers. This is a sad day for freedom of speech on the net but we have to place the safety and well being of our staff above all else. We would like to thank the thousands of people, from all backgrounds and religions, who gave us their support. They realised LiveLeak.com is a vehicle for many opinions and not just for the support of one. Perhaps there is still hope that this situation may produce a discussion that could benefit and educate all of us as to how we can accept one anothers culture. We stood for what we believe in, the ability to be heard, but in the end the price was too high.

Read full topic
